long_description: Keeping your back cool and your load light on scrambles and day hikes, the Gregory Jade 28 Pack for women balances comfort and performance. CrossFlo(TM) DTS suspension provides cooling airflow across your back and efficiently transfers load weight to your hips. Auto-Fit harness increases the stiffness of the frame as the load in the pack increases, helping ensure that the pack maintains its shape. Internal sleeve accommodates a hydration reservoir (not included); dual exit ports allow drinking tube to be routed on either side of pack. Front bucket pocket holds a rain jacket or other items you may need to access quickly. The Gregory Jade 28 Pack is made of 210-denier double diamond ripstop and 330-denier nylon oxford flatweave fabric that resists tears and abrasion. Removable rain cover; dual ice axe loops; hipbelt pockets; zippered front pocket; mesh side pockets; side compression straps. Closeout.
short_description: Keeping your back cool and your load light on scrambles and day hikes, the Gregory Jade 28 Pack for women balances comfort and performance.
